titles.title: A resolution designating Thursday, November 20, 2008, as "Feed America Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of measure as introduced in Senate

bill.summary:
9/27/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates Thursday, November 20, 2008, as Feed America Day.
Encourages the people of the United States to sacrifice two meals on Feed America Day and to donate the money that they would have spent on food to a religious or charitable organization of their choice for the purpose of feeding the hungry.
